response.overview: This DVD features exclusive and previously unseen film footage including in-depth interviews with those that worked closely with Queen throughout their career, including Wayne Sleep, Annie Nightingale, Peter Stringfellow, old friends, Journalists and Producers, as well as rare band footage interspersed through the program. Queen: Magic Moments traces the roots of their success, telling the bands story from day one to the day Freddie died. Using rare band footage and exclusive interviews with the groups closest confidantes this DVD is destined to become the ultimate Queen documentary.
response.title: Queen: Magic Moments
